title: [Feature Request] Capsule Layer
body_html:
CapsNet (airxiv) defines a Capsule Layer (primary or secondary) which outputs activity vectors representing instantiation parameters of a specific entity. Routing by agreement will be used, as mentioned in the paper, to pass information from one capsule layer to the next.

Is this worth a PR?

CapsNet (airxiv) defines a Capsule Layer (primary or secondary) which outputs activity vectors representing instantiation parameters of a specific entity. Routing by agreement will be used, as mentioned in the paper, to pass information from one capsule layer to the next.
Is this worth a PR?
body:
CapsNet [(airxiv)](https://arxiv.org/abs/1710.09829) defines a Capsule Layer (primary or secondary) which outputs activity vectors representing instantiation parameters of a specific entity. Routing by agreement will be used, as mentioned in the paper, to pass information from one capsule layer to the next.

Is this worth a PR?
